about_description: I am a Software Developer with 2 years of experience in software, game, and web development. I am committed to creating innovative technological solutions.
about_content_description: As a Software Developer and Game Developer, I focus on creating innovative solutions and interactive experiences through coding and game development.
about_content_sub_description: As a technology professional, I have expertise in developing software applications and games, and I am committed to delivering the best results to clients and users. With experience in various projects, I am ready to collaborate and create creative solutions that meet your needs.
skills_description: I have expertise in various fields of software and game development.
resume_description: Experienced in developing software and games with a focus on efficiency, performance, and optimal user experience. Skilled in backend development, API integration, and scalable system design.
bachelor_description: Mastering various programming languages such as Java, Python, C++, and C#. Deep understanding of data structures, algorithms, object-oriented programming, and software development paradigms. Actively involved in practical projects that sharpen skills in software development.
bachelor_sub_description: Additionally, studied software development cycles, project management, and software testing to ensure the quality and reliability of the produced products. For the final project, successfully designed and developed a solar power plant simulation application using Unity game engine as a demonstration of programming and interactive simulation skills.
surya_synergy_solutions_title: PT. Surya Synergy Solutions, Bogor, Indonesia
surya_synergy_solutions_description_0: Created backend concepts using Node.js and SQL databases to support secure and efficient voting transaction processes.
surya_synergy_solutions_description_1: Used Laravel for web design to support the implementation of a blockchain voting system.
surya_synergy_solutions_description_2: Designed solutions that combine blockchain technology with smart contracts for data security and accurate voting results.
surya_synergy_solutions_description_3: Performed maintenance and updates on applications created for clients.
self_employed_description_0: Developed applications to meet client needs for Content Interaction Bot using .Net as the interface and Javascript as the backend.
self_employed_description_1: Developed applications to meet client needs for WhatsApp Business Bot using .Net as the interface and Javascript as the backend.
self_employed_description_2: Performed maintenance and updates on applications created.
handmad_studio_description_0: Developed and released Nurse's Curse, a horror game focusing on a tense atmosphere and unique gameplay.
handmad_studio_description_1: Created WIROX RATS: 3D Rat Shooting, a first-person shooter game featuring 3D shooting mechanics.
handmad_studio_description_2: Both games were optimized to run smoothly and provide a stable gaming experience.
handmad_studio_description_3: Involved in various aspects of development, including implementing enemy AI, navigation systems, and state machine management.
portfolio_description: I have various projects that reflect my expertise in software development and game creation. Each project is designed to provide innovative and effective solutions while ensuring an optimal user experience.
contact_description: I am ready to help! Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or need more information.
